title: Wisp

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player with your current attack tier.
- Discharge stored energy at a player for an Unstoppable Attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Discharging will permanently reduce your attack or defense at random by one tier. This is permanent.
- Your Defense will be set to Vulnerable the night that you use Discharge.
- You cannot Discharge two nights in a row.
- Your permanent attack/defense reductions can set your attack to a minimum of None and your defense to a minimum of Vulnerable.
